raw_comment: I notice that people of color have a tendency to be more prevalent in professional sports. I wonder why there aren't more coaches of color. I understand that somewhat, but I feel as though there should be more diversity there. I don't really see an affect that this plays on my community.
ace_sentences: I notice that people of color are prevalent in professional sports.
I wonder why there are not more coaches of color.
I think that there should be more diversity among coaches.
I do not see an effect of this situation on my community.
